name: politico
text: The nation’s unemployment rate fell to 7.9 percent in September, the Labor Department said today in its final snapshot of the job market before Election Day https://t.co/oav8CI1tMh

name: politico
text: There have been many administration officials swarming Capitol Hill. White House chief of staff Mark Meadows has been in contact with SCOTUS nominee Amy Coney Barrett, McConnell and other key GOP senators.  https://t.co/lWUel2ff17

name: politico
text: Treasury Secretary Steven Mnuchin, who typically wears a mask, was at an in-person meeting with Pelosi at the Capitol yesterday https://t.co/lWUel2ff17

name: politico
text: Less than 24 hours ago, House Democrats passed their biggest coronavirus relief bill since May. But Congress is no closer to knowing whether any relief money will actually go out the door before Election Day. https://t.co/DLZtGoIoR9

name: politico
text:
Donald Trump had done everything possible to shift the focus of the presidential campaign away from his handling of the coronavirus.

Now he can't escape it.

https://t.co/Y2AmSvPfPf

name: politico
text: RT @ccadelago: New: Kamala Harris was tested yesterday, as part of the campaign's routine testing of principals, and tested negative, official tells me.

name: politico
text:
America’s national security apparatus is keeping a close eye on how foreign adversaries will try to exploit President Trump’s coronavirus diagnosis — a major potential vulnerability just weeks out from the presidential election

https://t.co/rnm0c2eKMu

name: politico
text: Wallace said that "what you saw on the TV is the closest I got to the president" at the debate Tuesday https://t.co/e29UjeBA8u

name: politico
text: New Jersey Gov. Phil Murphy is urging anyone who attended President Donald Trump’s fundraiser at Trump’s Bedminster golf course yesterday to self-quarantine and get tested for coronavirus https://t.co/jGxOuvzoVr

name: politico
text: Republican National Committee Chair Ronna McDaniel has tested positive for Covid-19, an RNC spokesperson said today https://t.co/gGr3XYO7AI

name: politico
text: "After a member of her family tested positive for COVID-19, the Chairwoman was tested for the virus. On Wednesday afternoon, she got confirmation she was COVID-19 positive," Mike Reed, RNC deputy chief of staff for communications, said in a statement https://t.co/gGr3XYO7AI

name: politico
text:
The news of McDaniel's diagnosis marks another major turn of events for Republicans one month away from Election Day, as both their top party official and presidential nominee will likely be forced to limit their activity in the campaign's final stretch

https://t.co/gGr3XYO7AI

name: politico
text: Former New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie, who helped President Trump prepare for the first presidential debate this week, said today that he will be retested for the coronavirus in the wake of the president’s announcement that he had tested positive https://t.co/40WxSGt084

name: politico
text: World leaders were quick to weigh in on Trump's Covid diagnosis, with official sympathy from the top and something approaching schadenfreude elsewhere https://t.co/cb3EPQgdX2
